content.question: Following the imposition of a $4 per-unit tax in a competitive market, the sellerâ€™s after-tax price falls from the original equilibrium price of $12 to $11. Which of the following statements relating to the imposition of the tax is true?

choices.label: The seller bears 75 percent of the tax burden.
The new after-tax equilibrium price is $16.
There is no deadweight loss from this tax.
The new after-tax equilibrium price is $15.

content.answer: The new after-tax equilibrium price is $15.
